description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics with wildcard support for Instance selection

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application",env=~"$env", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application",env=~"$env", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: Java SpringBoot APM
